dt-example.title: Status only button
dt-example.info:
The [previous example](./combinedButton.html) showed the `-content order` content type which is both a combined status and activation button. This content type also has an option to act as a status display only through it's `statusOnly` option. This example shows that in use along with `-init ordering.handler` not specified (i.e. allowed to be enabled), resulting in the whole of the header cell active as a click listener through DataTables' default behaviour.
This is particularly useful if you wish to use ColumnControl to provide the ordering indication icons, but want to keep the whole of the header as clickable.
